typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		National_Provider_Identifier as string,
		Last_Name_Organization_Name_of_the_Provider as string,
		First_Name_of_the_Provider as string,
		Middle_Initial_of_the_Provider as string,
		Credentials_of_the_Provider as string,
		Gender_of_the_Provider as string,
		Entity_Type_of_the_Provider as string,
		Street_Address_1_of_the_Provider as string,
		Street_Address_2_of_the_Provider as string,
		City_of_the_Provider as string,
		Zip_Code_of_the_Provider as string,
		Provider_RUCA as string,
		State_Code_of_the_Provider as string,
		Country_Code_of_the_Provider as string,
		Provider_Type_of_the_Provider as string,
		Medicare_Participation_Indicator as string,
		Number_of_HCPCS as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Services as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Medicare_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Submitted_Charge_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Medicare_Allowed_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Medicare_Payment_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Medicare_Standardized_Payment_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Drug_Suppress_Indicator as string,
		Number_of_HCPCS_Associated_With_Drug_Services as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Drug_Services as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Medicare_Beneficiaries_With_Drug_Services as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Drug_Submitted_Charge_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Drug_Medicare_Allowed_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Drug_Medicare_Payment_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Drug_Medicare_Standardized_Payment_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Medical_Suppress_Indicator as string,
		Number_of_HCPCS_Associated_With_Medical_Services as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Medical_Services as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Medicare_Beneficiaries_With_Medical_Services as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Medical_Submitted_Charge_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Medical_Medicare_Allowed_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Medical_Medicare_Payment_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Total_Medical_Medicare_Standardized_Payment_Amount as decimal(18,3),
		Average_Age_of_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Beneficiaries_Age_Less_65 as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Beneficiaries_Age_65_to_74 as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Beneficiaries_Age_75_to_84 as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Beneficiaries_Age_Greater_84 as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Female_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Male_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Non_Hispanic_White_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Black_or_African_American_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Asian_Pacific_Islander_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Hispanic_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_American_Indian_Alaska_Native_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Beneficiaries_With_Race_Not_Elsewhere_Classified as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Beneficiaries_With_Medicare_Only_Entitlement as decimal(18,3),
		Number_of_Beneficiaries_With_Medicare_Medicaid_Entitlement as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Atrial_Fibrillation as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Alzheimers_Disease_or_Dementia as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Asthma as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Cancer as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Heart_Failure as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Chronic_Kidney_Disease as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Chronic_Obstructive_Pulmonary_Disease as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Depression as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Diabetes as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Hyperlipidemia as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Hypertension as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Ischemic_Heart_Disease as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Osteoporosis as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Rheumatoid_Arthritis_Osteoarthritis as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Schizophrenia_Other_Psychotic_Disorders as decimal(18,3),
		Percent_of_Beneficiaries_Identified_With_Stroke as decimal(18,3),
		Average_HCC_Risk_Score_of_Beneficiaries as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 window(desc(Number_of_Medicare_Beneficiaries, false),
	cum_ben = sum(Number_of_Medicare_Beneficiaries)) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(temp = "temp") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(temp),
	total_ben = sum(Number_of_Medicare_Beneficiaries)) ~> Aggregate1
DerivedColumn1, Aggregate1 join(DerivedColumn1@temp == Aggregate1@temp,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(percent_ben = divide(cum_ben, total_ben)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 derive(segment_ben = 
case(percent_ben  <=0.2, 1,
     percent_ben <=0.4, 2,
       percent_ben <=0.6,  3,
       percent_ben <=0.8,  4,
       percent_ben <=1.0 , 5,0)
) ~> DerivedColumn3
